info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 1:30PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW BANDS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NIAGARA AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This lake effect snow band is producing snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 127 PM EST, a lake effect snow band extended from Grand Island and North Tonawanda to Lockport and Gasport. Another stronger snow band stretched from Niagara Falls and Lewiston to Olcott. These bands were drifting south toward the Buffalo Northtowns. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, Niagara Falls, North Tonawanda, Lockport, Kenmore, Tonawanda, Amherst, Grand Island, Newfane, Pendleton, Lewiston, Youngstown, Middleport, Fort Niagara State Park, Sanborn, Wilson, Barker, Cambria Center, Olcott, and Pendleton Center. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
